name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-bot-commands-menu-csharp
title: Create a commands menu
shortDescription: This sample add a command menu with a dropdown list of commands for your bot. Users can select a command from the list, which will insert the command title into the compose box. Then, they can select Send to execute the command.
longDescription: This sample add a command menu with a dropdown list of commands for your bot. Users can select a command from the list, which will insert the command title into the compose box. Then, they can select Send to execute the command.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing teams commands menu

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
